author: Special Correspondent
text:
District Election Officer and Collector S. Natarajan stepped up Systematic Voters’ Education and Electoral Participation (SVEEP) in Ramanathapuram and Tiruvadanai Assembly segments and inspected the vehicle check operations by the flying squads on Friday.

Seeking to achieve 100 per cent polling in the May 16 Assembly elections, the Collector visited the Government District Headquarters Hospital here and the primary health centre at Ragunathapuram, and distributed voter awareness pamphlets to the patients and their attenders.

The Collector appealed to them to cast their votes without fail on May 16 and assert their democratic right.

He also visited the Government Hospital at Devipattinam, falling under Tiruvadanai Assembly constituency and interacted with the patients and general public after distributing the pamphlets.

Later, the Collector, accompanied by Tiruvadanai Assembly Constituency Election Officer Rajasekaran and other officials, inspected the vehicle check operations of the flying squad in Devipattinam area and advised the officials to carry out the checks without any bias.
title: Collector inspects vehicle check operations
